products.name: Rice
products.description: Premium quality rice, perfect for daily meals. Each grain is carefully selected to ensure a soft and fluffy texture. This 5kg package is ideal for families.

products.name: Beans
products.description: High-quality carioca beans, rich in protein and fiber. These beans are perfect for making traditional Brazilian feijoada. Packaged in a convenient 1kg bag.

products.name: Pasta
products.description: Durum wheat spaghetti pasta, ideal for creating delicious Italian dishes. This 500g package provides enough for multiple servings. Cooks to al dente perfection.

products.name: Soy Oil
products.description: Pure soy oil, perfect for frying and baking. Rich in essential fatty acids and vitamin E, this 1-liter bottle ensures high-quality cooking.

products.name: Sugar
products.description: Refined white sugar, ideal for baking and sweetening beverages. This 1kg package is a staple in every kitchen. Dissolves quickly and evenly.

products.name: Salt
products.description: Fine table salt, perfect for seasoning and cooking. This 1kg package ensures you have enough salt for all your culinary needs. Pure and natural.

products.name: Coffee
products.description: Ground coffee, sourced from the finest beans. This 500g package delivers a rich and aromatic experience. Perfect for starting your day.

products.name: Bread
products.description: Freshly baked bread, with a soft inside and crispy crust. Perfect for sandwiches or as a side with meals. This 1kg package offers great value.

products.name: Butter
products.description: Creamy salted butter, perfect for spreading and cooking. This 200g package ensures a rich and smooth flavor in every bite. High in quality.

products.name: Milk
products.description: Whole milk, rich in calcium and essential nutrients. This 1-liter carton is perfect for drinking, cooking, or adding to your coffee.

products.name: Eggs
products.description: Pack of 12 large eggs, sourced from free-range chickens. Rich in protein and perfect for baking, breakfast, or as a snack.

products.name: Cheese
products.description: Cheddar cheese block, 500g of creamy and rich flavor. Perfect for sandwiches, cooking, or as a snack. Made from high-quality milk.
